title: BRIEF-Spirit Aerosystems Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $1.65
text:
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $1.65

* Q1 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $1.22

* Q1 REVENUE $900.8 MILLION

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS HOLDINGS - FULL-YEAR 2021 CASH USED IN OPERATIONS IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN NEGATIVE $50 MILLION TO NEGATIVE $150 MILLION

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS HOLDINGS - FULL-YEAR 2021 FREE CASH FLOW IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN NEGATIVE $200 MILLION AND NEGATIVE $300 MILLION

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS HOLDINGS - EXPECT TO DELIVER ABOUT 160 737 MAX SHIPSETS IN 2021

* INCREASING 737 MAX PRODUCTION RATES IN LINE WITH BOEING 'S OBJECTIVE OF 31 AIRCRAFT PER MONTH IN 2022

* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.86, REVENUE VIEW $901.1 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
